metadata.title: CVE-2013-2850 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - high
metadata.description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in the iscsi_add_notunderstood_response functionin drivers/target/iscsi/iscsi_target_parameters.c in the iSCSI targetsubsystem in the Linux kernel through 3.9.4 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (memory corruption and OOPS) or possibly executearbitrary code via a long key that is not properly handled duringconstruction of an error-response packet.A reproduction case requires patching open-iscsi to send overly largekeys. Performing discovery in a loop will Oops the remote server.Attached is a proposed fix, and the patch I used in open-iscsi to triggerit. Thanks in advance for your cooperation in coordinating a fix forthis issue,

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2850` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.2.0-16-generic - 4.2.0-16.19
linux-image-4.2.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.2.0-16.19
linux-image-4.2.0-16-lowlatency - 4.2.0-16.19
linux-image-4.2.0-16-powerpc-e500mc - 4.2.0-16.19
linux-image-4.2.0-16-powerpc-smp - 4.2.0-16.19
linux-image-4.2.0-16-powerpc64-emb - 4.2.0-16.19
linux-image-4.2.0-16-powerpc64-smp - 4.2.0-16.19
linux-image-extra-4.2.0-16-generic - 4.2.0-16.19
No subscription required

linux-image-3.4.0-4-goldfish - 3.4.0-4.27
No subscription required

linux-image-3.4.0-7-mako - 3.4.0-7.40
No subscription required

linux-image-3.4.0-5-flo - 3.4.0-5.22
No subscription required

linux-image-4.2.0-1013-raspi2 - 4.2.0-1013.19
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1012-snapdragon - 4.4.0-1012.12
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1001-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1001-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
No subscription required

linux-image-4.8.0-36-generic - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
linux-image-4.8.0-36-generic-lpae - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
linux-image-4.8.0-36-lowlatency - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
linux-image-extra-4.8.0-36-generic - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1003-gke - 4.4.0-1003.3

No subscription required
